items.q: In the game of Settlers of Catan, what combination of resources is required to build a road?
items.explanation: Building roads allows you to expand your network to new resource hexes.

items.q: In the video game 'Half-Life', the protagonist is a heavily armored space marine.
items.explanation: The protagonist, Gordon Freeman, is a theoretical physicist.

items.q: The standard layout of a dartboard places high numbers next to very low numbers.
items.explanation: This layout rewards accuracy and severely punishes near misses.

items.q: What critically acclaimed role-playing video game features a monster hunter named Geralt of Rivia?
items.explanation: It is widely considered one of the greatest RPGs ever made.

items.q: Which classic strategy board game focuses on establishing train routes across North America?
items.explanation: Players collect beautifully animated train cars to claim routes.

items.q: In Dungeons & Dragons, what die does a player roll to see if their attack hits an enemy?
items.explanation: The player must meet or exceed the enemy's armor class.

items.q: What competitive card game, released by Richard Garfield in 1993, pioneered the collectible card game genre?
items.explanation: It established mechanics used in many subsequent card games.

items.q: Which iconic video game series features the King of Iron Fist Tournament?
items.explanation: The fighting game revolves around the dysfunctional Mishima family.

items.q: In Poker, what hand contains five cards of the exact same suit in sequential order?
items.explanation: A royal flush is a straight flush containing the highest cards.

items.q: What cooperative board game tasks players with violently curing four global diseases?
items.explanation: Players work together as specialists preventing catastrophic outbreaks.
